name: Fling the Sling - Sling Ball Game
name_original: Fling the Sling - Sling Ball Game
description:
Fling the Sling is a an addictive and fun game where the player stretches and flings the sling ball into air and move from one white ball to another in order to collect them, when the user collects all the balls, A vortex (unique ball) appears and again the user flings the sling ball into air and reach that vortex, this will result in completion of level. This is the objective of a game basically.

As the game progresses, it becomes more challenging and the user faces different and difficult hurdles such as, walls between white balls which he has to go around, flying creatures and sharp nails on the wall and floor. User avoids all these obstacles and tries to clear the level in time. Otherwise it will cause failure. Your target is to just move to and fro for balls collection and for unlocking the next level. Play right away with above same strategy.

Can you beat this challenging game of sling balls? If so then prove it!

Download it!


Features:
Simple and addictive game play
Exciting and Challenging levels


How to play:
Tap to Play from main menu
Select a level from game map
You can mute un mute sound from top left corner
Pause icon will help you Restart or redirect towards Main Menu
A vortex(unique ball) with changing color will appear after collecting white balls in each level
Reach to that vortex again
Obstacles appear in form of spike nails on walls and on floor
Avoid to strike with flying objects
Collide shall cause game over
Complete each level in a given time and proceed to next
Get Help from icon in main menu
